actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat expenses incurred for the adoption of a child as amounts paid for medical care.

summary.text: Provides for the treatment of expenses incurred for the adoption of a child as amounts paid for medical care for purposes of deductibility under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to treat expenses incurred for the adoption of a child as amounts paid for medical care.
